alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Caribou, northeastern Bannock and southeastern Bingham Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Portneuf Gap to 9 miles northwest of Grace. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lava Hot Springs, Chesterfield Reservoir, Inkom, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Chesterfield and Bancroft. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blackfoot Mountains; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
